name: Don't Play This Game (salazart)
description:
CONTENT WARNING: Themes of abuse and coercion.

Do not play this game. 

This game does not want to be played. 

This is not a joke game or a gag game. 

This game has not consented to be played. 

Animism: The theory and belief that objects have souls. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This is an artist book turned into a video game with the intention of exploring player/readers role in using art. 

~~~~~~~~CREDITS~~~~~~~~

Made in collaboration with Crawlspace. 

Sounds from freesounds.org

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`

Salazart 2018
